pages.text: According to newspapers, farmer John Sheppard led his flock of sheep too close to a grassy cave in 2004, resulting in the loss of 2 sheeps in the cave. These, however, reappeared well fed but $(l:infected_animals/baashroom)somewhat changed$() after a few days.
The wool was fungus and edible.
How this infection came about is unclear, but the farmer no longer has to slaughter sheep to get a meal.
